abstract: Zuzanna Bijoch is transformed with makeup by Pat McGrath and hair by Luigi Murenu.
snippet: Zuzanna Bijoch is transformed with makeup by Pat McGrath and hair by Luigi Murenu.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Greg Kessler captures the transformations of Paris Fashion Week. Here, the model Zuzanna Bijoch from Next Model Management before (left) and after (right) transforms, with makeup by Pat McGrath and hair by Luigi Murenu for John Frieda. (Drag the orange bar left to reveal the full transformation.)
